task.en: Preview the png image without opening it.
task.zh: 预览png类型的那张图片，但是不要直接打开。
task.ja: PNG画像をプレビューしてください。ただし、直接開かないでください。
task.ru: Просмотрите изображение PNG, не открывая его.

pre_command: open /Users/ec2-user/Desktop; osascript -e 'tell application "Finder" to close windows' && rm -rf /Users/ec2-user/Documents/benchmark_files/ && cp -r /Users/ec2-user/Benchmark_Backup/benchmark_files /Users/ec2-user/Documents && open /Users/ec2-user/Documents/benchmark_files/Multimedia/Faces
grading_command: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXChildren" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "000004.png" && osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Quick Look" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXChildren" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "000004.png" && osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "快速查看" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXChildren" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "000004.png" && osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "معاينة سريعة" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXChildren" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "000004.png" && osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "クイックルック" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXChildren" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "000004.png" && osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Просмотр" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXChildren" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "000004.png" && echo "True" || echo "False"
